content.prompt: The presence of Bellona and the statement that “the people are obedient under you, o great Philip” best support the argument that the artist

choices.label: favored the independence of the Dutch Republic
wished to portray the Catholic Habsburgs as the victors
was unfamiliar with classical humanist thought
rejected Christian influence on his art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
